com.barryholroyd.walmartproducts

Class GetProducts

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.barryholroyd.walmartproducts.GetProducts

  • public class GetProducts
extends java.lang.Object
    Get a list of Walmart products.
    Author:
    Barry Holroyd
    See Also:
    Walmart Products API (mock), Documentation

    • Field Detail

      • getProducts

        public static final GetProducts getProducts
        Singleton

      • batchSize

        private static final int batchSize
        Number of products to request in a single nextBatch. Maximum is 30.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • API_KEY

        private static final java.lang.String API_KEY
        API key. This was sent to me by Walmart for the test taken in August, 2016.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • API_PREFIX

        private static final java.lang.String API_PREFIX
        URL Prefix. Full URL is: API_PREFIX + API_KEY + "/<nextBatch>/<batchSize>"
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • nextBatch

        private int nextBatch
        The "nextBatch" of the next set of "batchSize" products to get.

      • maxProducts

        private static int maxProducts
        The total number of products available. This is included in the response to each request.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GetProducts

        GetProducts()
        Private constructor to prevent external instantiation. The check for null isn't strictly necessary, but theoretically prevents someone from using reflection and

    • Method Detail

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Reset the "nextBatch" of products to be displayed to the first nextBatch.

      • getNextBatch

        public void getNextBatch()
        Get the next "nextBatch" of products to be displayed. The size of each nextBatch is determined by "batchSize".

      • getProducts

        private void getProducts(int batch,
                         int count)
        Get the next batch of products.
        Parameters:
        batch - The batch to be downloaded.
        count - the number of items in the batch to be downloaded.

      • checkNetworkConnectivity

        private boolean checkNetworkConnectivity()
